mapper.update: update tbl_worktime set stime = sysdate, status = 1 where to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm-dd') and status = 0 and fk_member_idx = #{idx} and trunc(sysdate)+10/24 >= sysdate

update tbl_worktime set stime = sysdate, status = 1, wstatus = 1 where to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm-dd') and status = 0 and fk_member_idx = #{idx} and trunc(sysdate)+10/24 < sysdate

update tbl_worktime set etime = sysdate, status = 2 where to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm-dd') and status = 1 and fk_member_idx = #{idx} and trunc(sysdate)+20/24 <= sysdate and wstatus = 0

update tbl_worktime set etime = sysdate, status = 2 , wstatus = 2 where to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm-dd') and status = 1 and fk_member_idx = #{idx} and trunc(sysdate)+20/24 > sysdate and wstatus = 0

update tbl_worktime set etime = sysdate, status = 2 , wstatus = 4 where to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'mm-dd') and status = 1 and fk_member_idx = #{idx} and trunc(sysdate)+20/24 > sysdate and wstatus = 1
mapper.select: select wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name from ( select rownum as rno, wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name from ( select wt_idx, to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') as wt_date, to_char(stime, 'hh24:mi') as stime, to_char(etime, 'hh24:mi') as etime , to_char(nvl(trunc((etime-stime)*24),0))||'시간' as whour , to_char(nvl(trunc((((etime-stime)*24)-(trunc((etime-stime)*24)))*60),0))||'분' as wminute , w.status, wstatus, name from tbl_worktime w join tbl_member m on w.fk_member_idx = m.idx where m.status = 1 and m.idx = #{idx} order by wt_idx desc )V )T where rno >= #{startRno} and rno <= #{endRno}

select wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name from ( select rownum as rno, wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name from ( select wt_idx, to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') as wt_date, to_char(stime, 'hh24:mi') as stime, to_char(etime, 'hh24:mi') as etime , to_char(nvl(trunc((etime-stime)*24),0))||'시간' as whour , to_char(nvl(trunc((((etime-stime)*24)-(trunc((etime-stime)*24)))*60),0))||'분' as wminute , w.status, wstatus, name from tbl_worktime w join tbl_member m on w.fk_member_idx = m.idx where m.status = 1 and m.idx = #{idx} and substr(wt_date,4,2) = #{month} order by wt_idx desc )V )T where rno >= #{startRno} and rno <= #{endRno}

select t.idx as tidx, t.name as tname, tw.idx as twidx , tw.status as twstatus, m.idx as midx, m.userid as userid , m.name as username, m.img as img , to_char(tw.regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regdate , nvl(to_char(tw.disdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd'),'-') as disdate from tbl_team t join tbl_teamwon tw on t.idx = tw.fk_team_idx join tbl_member m on tw.fk_member_idx = m.idx where t.idx = #{tidx} and tw.status in (1,0) order by tw.idx

select wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name, regdate, teamidx, disdate from ( select rownum as rno, wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name, regdate, teamidx, disdate from ( select wt_idx, to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') as wt_date, to_char(stime, 'hh24:mi') as stime, to_char(etime, 'hh24:mi') as etime , to_char(nvl(trunc((etime-stime)*24),0))||'시간' as whour , to_char(nvl(trunc((((etime-stime)*24)-(trunc((etime-stime)*24)))*60),0))||'분' as wminute , w.status, wstatus, name , to_char(tw.regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regdate , to_char(tw.disdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as disdate , tw.fk_team_idx as teamidx from tbl_worktime w join tbl_member m on w.fk_member_idx = m.idx join tbl_teamwon tw on m.idx = tw.fk_member_idx where m.status = 1 and tw.idx = #{twidx} and (((disdate is null) and (trunc(w.wt_date) >= trunc(tw.regdate))) or ((disdate is not null) and (trunc(w.wt_date) >= trunc(tw.regdate)) and (trunc(w.wt_date) <= trunc(tw.disdate)))) order by wt_idx desc )V )T where rno >= #{startRno} and rno <= #{endRno}

select wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name, regdate, teamidx, disdate from ( select rownum as rno, wt_idx, wt_date, stime, etime, whour, wminute, status, wstatus, name, regdate, teamidx, disdate from ( select wt_idx, to_char(wt_date, 'mm-dd') as wt_date, to_char(stime, 'hh24:mi') as stime, to_char(etime, 'hh24:mi') as etime , to_char(nvl(trunc((etime-stime)*24),0))||'시간' as whour , to_char(nvl(trunc((((etime-stime)*24)-(trunc((etime-stime)*24)))*60),0))||'분' as wminute , w.status, wstatus, name , to_char(tw.regdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as regdate , to_char(tw.disdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as disdate , tw.fk_team_idx as teamidx from tbl_worktime w join tbl_member m on w.fk_member_idx = m.idx join tbl_teamwon tw on m.idx = tw.fk_member_idx where m.status = 1 and tw.idx = #{twidx} and (((disdate is null) and (trunc(w.wt_date) >= trunc(tw.regdate))) or ((disdate is not null) and (trunc(w.wt_date) >= trunc(tw.regdate)) and (trunc(w.wt_date) <= trunc(tw.disdate)))) and substr(wt_date,4,2) = #{month} order by wt_idx desc )V )T where rno >= #{startRno} and rno <= #{endRno}

select count(*) from tbl_worktime wt join tbl_teamwon tw on wt.fk_member_idx = tw.fk_member_idx where tw.idx = #{twidx} and (((tw.disdate is null) and (trunc(wt.wt_date) >= trunc(tw.regdate))) or ((tw.disdate is not null) and (trunc(wt.wt_date) >= trunc(tw.regdate)) and (trunc(wt.wt_date) <= trunc(tw.disdate))))

select m.idx as midx ,t.idx as tidx ,tw.idx as twidx, tw.status as twstatus, m.userid as userid, m.name as username, t.name as teamname, t.img as teamimg from tbl_teamwon tw join tbl_member m on tw.fk_member_idx = m.idx join tbl_team t on tw.fk_team_idx = t.idx where m.status = 1 and m.idx = #{idx}
select nvl(wstatus,-1) as wstatus, count(*) as cnt from tbl_worktime where fk_member_idx = #{idx} and to_char(wt_date, 'yyyy-mm') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm') group by rollup(wstatus)
